OOC: I'm probably wrong. Most people say that the the war on Cybertron
was one, and when the Transformers awoke on Earth it was a differant
one. I usually say they were the same war.

::Hot Rod::

He knew what Unitron was trying to do. If he were to get angry he would
lose his edge, and the battle would be Unitron's. He had been doing this
to long to let that happan.

As Unitron came at him, Hot Rod grabbed Unitrons wrist with one hand,
and grabbed lower on his arm with the other. He then turned, pulling
Unitrons arm over his shoulder. He tryed to flip Unitron over his back.
"You are wrong. Magnus, Springer, Kup, they were all fit for command.
The Matrix chose me."

OOC: If you have a problem with the contact in that post just tell me.
